user.title: Set up Planty Plant Manager
user.description:
Welcome to Planty! This integration helps you keep track of your houseplants' watering schedule.

Planty includes a database of {plant_count} common houseplants with their optimal watering schedules and soil humidity levels.

You can track your plants using:
- Manual countdown timers
- Soil humidity sensors
- Custom plant configurations

Click Submit to continue with setup.

add_plant.title: Add Your First Plant
add_plant.description:
Let's add your first plant to monitor.

You can choose from our plant database or create a custom plant. If you have soil humidity sensors ({available_sensors} detected), you can use sensor-based monitoring instead of manual countdowns.

add_plant_success.title: Plant Added Successfully!
add_plant_success.description:
Great! {plant_name} has been added to your plant collection.

Would you like to add another plant?
